Actions/Permissions: Allow s3:ListAllMyBuckets
Business justification: Enumerate buckets for workflows/UI.

Actions/Permissions: Allow s3:ListBucket
Tags / Conditions:
StringLike s3:prefix=[incoming/*, analytics-hub/*, prism/*, lab-workshop/*]
StringEquals aws:sourceVpce=<YOUR_VPCE_ID>
Business justification: Browse required prefixes for development/testing.

Actions/Permissions:
Allow s3:GetObject
Allow s3:PutObject
Allow s3:DeleteObject
Tags / Conditions: StringEquals aws:sourceVpce=<YOUR_VPCE_ID>
Business justification: Write ETL scripts and dev outputs; save Athena results.

Actions/Permissions: Allow s3:GetObject
Tags / Conditions: StringEquals aws:sourceVpce=<YOUR_VPCE_ID>
Business justification: Read curated data for development/validation.

Actions/Permissions:
Deny s3:PutObject
Deny s3:DeleteObject
Business justification: Protect curated (prism) and raw (icebox) from human writes.

Actions/Permissions:
Allow glue:GetDatabase
Allow glue:GetDatabases
Allow glue:GetTable
Allow glue:GetTables
Allow glue:SearchTables
Comments: Read metadata across the catalog for development.
Business justification: Builders need to inspect schema/metadata.

Actions/Permissions:
Deny glue:DeleteTable
Deny glue:BatchDeleteTable
Deny glue:DeleteDatabase
Comments: Guardrail: Deny destructive DDL in curated (prism).
Business justification: Avoid accidental deletion of production tables/db.

Actions/Permissions:
Allow glue:CreateTable
Allow glue:UpdateTable
Allow glue:GetPartition
Allow glue:GetPartitions
Comments: Permit non-destructive schema evolution and reads in curated.
Business justification: Allow safe updates; drops remain denied (Lake Formation also applies).

Actions/Permissions:
Allow glue:CreateDatabase
Allow glue:UpdateDatabase
Allow glue:DeleteDatabase
Allow glue:CreateTable
Allow glue:UpdateTable
Allow glue:DeleteTable
Allow glue:GetDatabase
Allow glue:GetTable
Allow glue:GetTables
Business justification: Builders need a safe sandbox for DDL.

Actions/Permissions:
Allow glue:CreatePartition
Allow glue:BatchCreatePartition
Allow glue:UpdatePartition
Allow glue:BatchUpdatePartition
Allow glue:DeletePartition
Allow glue:BatchDeletePartition
Allow glue:GetPartition
Allow glue:GetPartitions
Allow glue:CreatePartitionIndex
Allow glue:DeletePartitionIndex
Allow glue:GetPartitionIndexes
Tags / Conditions: Note: Lake Formation enforces write privileges on curated tables
Comments: Partition & index management (curated writes still governed by LF).
Business justification: Enable partition CRUD and performance indexes.

Actions/Permissions:
Allow glue:CreateUserDefinedFunction
Allow glue:UpdateUserDefinedFunction
Allow glue:DeleteUserDefinedFunction
Allow glue:GetUserDefinedFunction
Allow glue:GetUserDefinedFunctions
Business justification: Register UDFs for dev workloads.

Actions/Permissions:
Allow glue:CreateConnection
Allow glue:UpdateConnection
Allow glue:DeleteConnection
Allow glue:GetConnection
Allow glue:GetConnections
Allow glue:TestConnection
Tags / Conditions:
Create: require aws:RequestTag/Environment=Dev
Update/Delete: require aws:ResourceTag/Environment=Dev
Business justification: Builders manage dev-only Glue connections.

Actions/Permissions:
Allow glue:CreateSecurityConfiguration
Allow glue:GetSecurityConfiguration
Allow glue:GetSecurityConfigurations
Allow glue:DeleteSecurityConfiguration
Tags / Conditions: Dev-only naming or tag guard (Environment=Dev)
Business justification: Manage job bookmarks/encryption settings in dev.

Actions/Permissions: Allow glue:CreateJob
Tags / Conditions:
Require aws:RequestTag/Environment=Dev
Require aws:RequestTag/Project=DataDash
ForAllValues:StringEquals aws:TagKeys=[Environment, Project]
Business justification: Builders may create jobs only when tagged as Dev.

Allow glue:GetJobRuns

Actions/Permissions:
Allow glue:StartJobRun
Allow glue:BatchStopJobRun

Actions/Permissions:
Deny glue:StartJobRun

Deny glue:UpdateJob
Deny glue:DeleteJob
Tags / Conditions: StringEquals aws:ResourceTag/Environment=Prod
Comments: Guardrail: No Prod job control from Builder.
Business justification: Segregation of duties.
